Description: Square textile fragment of undyed linen furnishing fabric bearing tapestry motif in coloured wool in form of bird with end of blue bar in beak; plain weave: warp-undyed linen (S/28), weft-undyed linen (S/9); tapestry on paired threads: warp-undyed linen (S/9), weft-undyed linen (S/48), orange, pink, red, light green, green, light blue, dark blue, purple wool (S/purple is 48)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Dr Gulian Lansing
